title: The Twelve Days of Christmas
description: Genevieve Munroe was the toast of the ton until her father's death left the family destitute. Now she's hoping for one last happy Yuletide at Wenwood Abbey and a season of peace with their ever-feuding neighbors, the Pentercasts. But Gen's good will is strained when Squire Alan Pentercast, the object of her secret tendre, proposes a bold Christmas wager, with her hand in marriage as his prize.
author: Regina Scott
